user_profile.name: Hiroshi Tanaka
user_profile.description: Hiroshi is a 40-year-old technology enthusiast from Japan, with intermediate experience in using digital tools. He has a strong analytical personality, which drives his desire to teach his parent the nuances of video calling, as he values staying connected with family, especially in an academic setting. With a balanced decision-making style and a patient approach, he aims to ensure his parent feels comfortable using this technology despite his own resistance to rapid changes.
